Name: All Dream Long A Flower Storm
About the game: A whimsical, award-winning point-and-click visual novel adventure game from the creators of HUNGRY TEA PARTY and My Dear Frankenstein. Relax into a dreamscape alongside a friendly, hungry demon called Baku. Explore a world made of fairytales, traditional Japanese legends, classic Western literature, and peculiar scenery where real-life physics doesn't apply. Solve riddles and puzzles to help colorful characters, some human, some not. But be warned... the further you go into your dream, the less you may want to wake up. Play time: About 2 hours Endings: 4 (three normal, one true end) Release date (in Japanese): March 25, 2019 (in Korean): April 23, 2020 (in English): August 20, 2021 Made with: Tyranobuilder and Tyranoscript Silver Prize winner in the Tyrano Game Festival 2019.
